column1: Mass of Christian Burial will be 10:30am Monday
column3: 2015 at St. Wenceslaus Catholic Church in Milladore with Fr. John Ofori-Domah officiating. Catherine Warnecke along with St. Wenceslaus Senior Choir will provide the music for the service. Burial will be in the church cemetery with grandchildren serving as pallbearers. Visitations will be on Sunday
column4: from 4-8pm at the Martens/Rembs Funeral Home in Junction City and again on Monday at the church from 9:30am until service time.
